name: podamShouldHandleTheManufacturingOfPojosWithGenericTypesInTheConstructor

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ClassGenericConstructorPojo with specific types {class java.lang.String}
Then the pojo uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ClassGenericConstructorPojo@1f614fd must be of the type class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ClassGenericConstructorPojo
Then the pojo class java.lang.String must be of the type class java.lang.Class
Then the two objects class java.lang.String and class java.lang.String should be equal

title: Podam should handle the manufacturing of POJOs with generic types in constructor
